0.text: Innate: Periodically, Poppy  throws her buckler as her next basic attack, which has  350 bonus range and deals 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. The buckler then falls near the target after 1 second, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.

1.text: Upon retrieving the buckler, Poppy  shields herself for  13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to Poppy automatically. Enemy  champions can step on the buckler to destroy it.

0.text: Active: Poppy smashes the area in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Against  monsters, the damage based on their maximum health is capped.

0.content: 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 (+ 90% bonus AD) (+ 8% of target's maximum health)

1.content: 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 180% bonus AD) (+ 16% of target's maximum health)

1.text: The impact creates a field for 1 second that  slows enemies within, which then ruptures to deal the same physical damage.

0.text: Passive: Poppy increases her  total armor and  total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.

1.text: Active: Poppy gains  40% bonus movement speed and creates an aura around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to  dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage, knocked up for 0.5 seconds and, if they were successfully interrupted,  grounded and  slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.

2.text: Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.

0.text: Active: Poppy  dashes to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and  carries them along with her for up to 400 units.

1.text: If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and  stuns them for a duration.

0.text: Active: Poppy  charges while being  slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's  range and  knockback distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast at any time within the duration.

1.text: Recast: Poppy releases the charge with a 0.25 seconds cast time, launching her hammer upwards to deal physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her,  knocking them up for 1 second.

2.text: If Keeper's Verdict charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and  knocks back targets up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's fountain. If no enemies are within the uncharged hitbox, Poppy instead sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy  champion, causing a hammer to erupt. Enemies hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the empowered effects.

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a  15-second cooldown.

4.text: Enemies knocked  airborne are  revealed and are rendered  untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict charged for more than 0.5 seconds.
